org.nasdanika.html.model.bootstrap

Interface Text

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EObject, Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextImpl

    public interface Text
extends EObject
    A representation of the model object 'Text'. Text styling.

    The following features are supported:

    • Alignment
    • Color
    • Transform
    • Weight
    • Monospace
    • Italic
    • Nowrap
    • Truncate
    See Also:
    BootstrapPackage.getText()
